text: mthl aladhin jaealuu al'awthan min dun allah 'awlia' yarjun nsrha, kamathal aleankabut alty eamilat bytana linafsiha lyhfzha, falam yughn eanha shyyana eind hajatiha 'ilyh, fkdhlk hwla' almushrikun lm yughn eanhum 'awliawuhum aladhin atakhadhuhum min dun allah shyyana, wa'iin 'adeaf albuyut labyt alenkbwt, law kanuu yaelamun dhlk ma atakhadhuhum awlya', fahum la ynfewnhm wala ydrwnhm
